summary: Create a "Will you be my valentine fizza" website.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page Valentine-themed website that prominently displays the message “Will you be my valentine fizza?” and a short subtitle/instruction in English.

Add interactive “Yes” and “No” response buttons with playful behavior: clicking “Yes” shows a celebratory success state; clicking “No” shows a playful alternate reaction that encourages another choice without blocking navigation or breaking accessibility.

Establish and apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the entire site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) with a Valentine + pizza (“fizza”) vibe; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.
Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the page (e.g., hero illustration and subtle background pattern).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a "Will you be my valentine fizza" (valentine-themed) website.
